title: Beautiful house

title: Corner lot! Well maintaned 2 bed 2 bath & Update kitchen with Laundry
description: This move-in-ready 2 bedroom, 2 bath townhome with NO HOA will not be on the market for long!  Home includes: A fresh coat of neutral paint is attractive and the recently installed roof is comforting. Enter the front door to the living room with a cozy wood fireplace . Just beyond the living room is the dining room and kitchen with sliding door to covered patio and exterior storage closet. Tons of cabinets in the update Kitchen along with a new backsplash, and newer glass cooktop. Utility/laundry room (Newer LG Washer and vent-less dryer included) adjoins the update kitchen which is very convenient. Powder room is located off the hallway area between the living and dining room. A coat closet for guests completes the first floor of this lovely home along with an additional storage closet. Continue to the second floor to the primary bedroom with plenty of closet space and its' own sink/vanity. The main bathroom has two entries form either the master bedroom or the second floor hallway. The two additional bedrooms are comfortably sized. Be sure to note the pull down stairs allowing for attic storage. Parking for 2 cars is accessible from the back entrance of home. There is additional storage in the back and a relatively new shed to put all your tools. Send your number for further details.

title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom Townhouse for Rent!
description: Welcome to this highly desired one level living Ranch townhouse with a huge finished basement located in the Highlands in New Britain Township and the highly rated Central Bucks School District. Step inside and you will notice the bright open floor plan featuring neutral paint throughout and hardwood floors running from the foyer into the dining room and the spacious great room featuring vaulted ceiling and tons of windows to let the sunlight spill in, also featuring built in bookshelves. A formal dining room is also just off the foyer and is adjacent to the eat in kitchen. The kitchen features an abundance of cabinets and counter space, newer stainless steel appliances and a cozy breakfast area which features a sliding door leading you out to the maintenance free deck and private yard. The master bedroom is spacious with vaulted ceiling offering a perfect retreat at the end of a long day featuring a well appointed master bathroom and huge walk in closet. Two additional nice size bedrooms offer large closets and share the hall bathroom. A large utility closet could house the washer and dryer if desired. Downstairs the huge basement features a large finished rec room and an additional finished room, perfect for a craft or hobby room. There is still lots of unfinished area which has a large laundry room and offers plenty of storage or room for further finished area. Located just minutes from shopping areas, and the major roadways for easy commuting. Parking is assigned an also has plenty of overflow spaces. Don't wait to be a part of this wonderful community

title: Unique opportunity to rent a historic Society Hill townhouse!
description: Unique opportunity to rent a historic Society Hill townhouse with parking and garden! Welcome to 600 Spruce Street, a regal townhouse just steps from Washington Square Park. Listed on the Philadelphia Register of Historic places, this house is a storied masterpiece spanning 4,225 sq ft across 4 stories. Features include 5 large bedrooms, including a full floor master suite, 3.5 baths, a finished lower level, and a lovely backyard garden and patio. Additionally, its 3 outward facing exposures cultivate brilliant natural light throughout, truly highlighting its original features like beautiful marble fireplaces and crown moldings. Its perfect location adds even more value. Society Hill is home to many exceptional restaurants, boutiques, historic attractions, Penn's Landing as well as Jefferson and Pennsylvania Hospitals. Don't miss your chance to experience this distinguished house in one of Philadelphia s most coveted locations. Owner is open to 1,2 or 3 year lease.

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apt Home with Wood Floors, Near Stores
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 706 on the 7th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers such as BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as May 15, 2023!
Nearby Grocery Stores:
* Sue's Produce Market
* Venditore by Giordano
* Di Bruno Bros.
* Rittenhouse Market
* Target

Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 706 on 7th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large north-facing windows with city skyline view
* Renovated kitchen with granite counters
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Renovated bathroom
* Wood floors
Community Amenities:
* Historic high-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Laundry room on every floor and large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Package lockers by Luxer One in 2nd floor package room
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with pool table, kitchen, and places to work or study
* Fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Guest suites
* Bicycle storage
* Elevator building with front door attendant and concierge
* Online resident portal RentCafe for rent payments and more
* On-site maintenance
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Roof deck under renovation until spring 2023
We can furnish a home for you over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent, which we can calculate for you.
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 706 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Rittenhouse Claridge
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term. For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Rent depends upon lease term and move-in date. Check out rittenhouseclaridge.com!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

title: On-site Parking, In-unit laundry, Outdoor Terrace
description:
545 N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. You’ll find beautiful amenities right outside your door, including a second floor lounge ideal for working parents. Divided into several separate but interconnected spaces, the lounge offers room for coworking, family time, and group gatherings, along with a dedicated space for children and playtime. For a breath of fresh air, head up to the expansive rooftop deck. There you’ll find a cozy indoor lounge that looks out onto the 9,700 square foot green roof, complete with a variety of seating perfect for gazing onto city views or taking in the lush rooftop landscaping. The sleek loft-style interiors feature high ceilings, chef’s kitchens, and sun-drenched open spaces. The various interior layouts present several living options, each providing a clean and timeless canvas ready for your personal touch. The main lobby invites residents and guests into a versatile live-work space containing a coffee bar and lounge, co-working spaces and conference room, and secured mail and package room. The penthouse suite of finely-crafted boutique amenities offers a thoughtfully-designed entertainment space, complete with a residents’ lounge, state-of-the-art fitness center, and a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of Philadelphia. Our fully renovated apartments are located within the iconic Croydon Hall. Each apartment features amazing views and tons of light in addition to granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious layouts, environmentally friendly PVC and tile flooring, self-controlled heating and cooling via PTAC unit, and bathrooms equipped with a rainfall showerhead, tying everything together with sleek, modern finishes you'll be sure to love.

The Community

- There are 2 bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) and the MFL station is just a 10-15 minute stroll.

Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. Need a virtual tour? We can do so if you have an iPhone or iPad. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!

title: 2-bed, 1-bath Home Features 2 Outdoor Spaces & Beautifully Modern Comf
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.
410 S Iseminger St

Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square with a 1-car deeded garage spot your new home! title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.

title: LIMITED TIME SPECIAL AT EMERSON APARTMENTS!!
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Heat, hot water and cooking gas included!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
Please give us a call or send an email to schedule an appointment for a viewing.
Physical applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75 for up to two applicants.
*Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
*Must be 21 years of age or older
2. A copy of your social security card and ID is recommended.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have an arrest
record. Your income needs to be at least two - three times the cost of rent.

title: This Charming Trinity Style Home in the Heart of Philadelphia!
description:
This charming trinity style home in the heart of Philadelphia's vibrant Bella Vista neighborhood is now available for rent. This well kept one bedroom, one bathroom townhome boasts tons of character throughout. Featuring one room per floor with a spacious eat-in kitchen with access through the sliding glass doors to shared outdoor area. Upstairs on the second floor is a full bathroom with tub shower and down the hall is a nicely sized room that can be used as a second bedroom or the living/entertainment area. At the top of the stairs features a skylight, letting in an abundance of natural light in the staircase and the primary bedroom. Other amenities include laundry in the basement, ceiling fans throughout, and closet space in each room. With its convenient location, having easy access to public transportation and a short walk to local shops, restaurants cafes, and all the cultural attractions that Philadelphia is famous for. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to rent in one of Philadelphia's most sought-after areas! Pet(s) 50lbs and less accepted. First, Last & Security due at signing.
904 S Delhi St

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!
1343 Fitzwater St #301

title: One bedroom apartment near Girard College
description:
A. Description
Looking for the perfect one-bedroom apartment near Girard College? Look no further! This stunning apartment is located in the heart of zip code 19121 and boasts a host of amenities that are sure to impress.
First and foremost, this apartment features a spacious bedroom with ample closet space and natural light. The living room is also spacious and perfect for entertaining guests or just relaxing after a long day. The apartment has a full kitchen equipped with all the essentials including a refrigerator, stove, and oven.
But what really sets this apartment apart is its location. Situated just minutes away from Girard College, this apartment is surrounded by some of the best amenities the area has to offer. You'll be within walking distance of several grocery stores, restaurants, and shops. Whether you're in the mood for a quick bite or a fancy dinner, you'll find everything you need just steps away.
For those who enjoy the outdoors, this apartment is also located near several parks including Fairmount Park, which offers miles of scenic trails and breathtaking views of the city skyline. If you're looking for something more active, there are also several gyms and fitness centers in the area.
Finally, transportation is a breeze with easy access to several major highways and public transportation options. Whether you're commuting to work or exploring the city, you'll have everything you need right at your fingertips.
Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in Philadelphia. Contact us today to schedule a tour of this amazing one-bedroom apartment near Girard College!
B. Amenities
Restaurants and Cafes: The neighborhood has a variety of restaurants and cafes, from casual to fine dining, offering diverse cuisine options including Italian, Mexican, Chinese, and American.
Grocery Stores: Several grocery stores such as Fresh Grocer, ALDI, and Giant are located within walking distance, making grocery shopping a breeze.
Fitness Centers: The area has several fitness centers, including Planet Fitness, Philadelphia Sports Clubs, and Fitness Works, providing residents with various workout options.
Parks and Green Spaces: Fairmount Park and the Schuylkill River Trail are nearby, offering residents miles of trails for walking, jogging, biking, and enjoying nature.
Public Transportation: The apartment is conveniently located near several public transportation options, including SEPTA bus routes and regional rail stations, making it easy to travel to other parts of Philadelphia.
Entertainment: The area is home to several entertainment venues, including the Liacouras Center, Union Transfer, and the Trocadero Theatre, offering residents access to concerts, comedy shows, and other live events.
Museums and Cultural Attractions: The Philadelphia Museum of Art, the Barnes Foundation, and the Franklin Institute are all located nearby, providing residents with access to world-class art, science, and cultural exhibits.
C. Distance to Amenities.
Girard College: Girard College is located about 1 mile south of 1410 N 21st Street, approximately a 20-minute walk or a 5-minute drive.
Fresh Grocer: Fresh Grocer is located about 0.6 miles east of 1410 N 21st Street, approximately a 10-minute walk or a 3-minute drive.
Fairmount Park: Fairmount Park is located about 2 miles west of 1410 N 21st Street, approximately a 10-minute drive or a 30-minute walk.
D. Transportation.
SEPTA bus routes: Several SEPTA bus routes run along or near N 21st Street, providing easy access to public transportation.
There are several bus routes that run along or near N 21st Street that provide easy access to public transportation. Some of the nearest bus stops to 1410 N 21st Street include:
Bus Stop for Route 2: The Route 2 bus stop is located at N 21st Street & Cecil B. Moore Avenue, approximately a 5-minute walk east of 1410 N 21st Street.
Bus Stop for Route 33: The Route 33 bus stop is located at N 22nd Street & Cecil B. Moore Avenue, approximately a 5-minute walk north of 1410 N 21st Street.
Bus Stop for Route 48: The Route 48 bus stop is located at N 20th Street & W Montgomery Avenue, approximately a 10-minute walk south of 1410 N 21st Street.
The closest subway station to 1410 N 21st Street in Philadelphia is the Cecil B. Moore Station on the Broad Street Line. It is located at the intersection of N Broad Street and Cecil B. Moore Avenue, approximately 0.8 miles east of 1410 N 21st Street. It is about a 15-minute walk or a 5-minute drive from the apartment.
The Broad Street Line runs north-south through the city, providing access to various parts of Philadelphia, including Center City, South Philadelphia, and North Philadelphia. The subway operates daily, with trains running every 8-10 minutes during peak hours and every 12-15 minutes during off-peak hours.

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

title: New fitness center, This is a cat friendly community
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. description:
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home at 812 on 8th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view

* Fitness center

* 24-hour concierge at front desk
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Yoga studio
* Elevator building with front door attendant
* Online resident portal RentCafe for maintenance requests, rent payments, lease renewals, and more!
* On-site maintenance 24/7

Rittenhouse Claridge
We can furnish a home for you over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent which we can calculate for you.
Price is for the 22 month lease term. For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Price depends upon lease term as well as move-in date. Check out our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

description:
YES, WE ARE OPEN! CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR! OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!If you’re looking for a modern and hip space to call home, then look no further than Apex Manayunk. Located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, we feature modern 1, 2, and 3-bedroom loft style apartments and townhomes, many with dens. Our 2 and 3-bedroom townhomes have a fun and industrial feel. That’s because Apex Manayunk expertly blends three brand-new buildings with four historic textile mill structures to create one of the region’s most exciting luxury apartment communities. title: Sedgwick Gardens Apartments has a nice 1 bedroom available
description:
Sedgwick Gardens Apartments
440 W. Sedgwick St
Philadelphia, Pa 19119
Call Lisa for appointment-
Located in the historical district of West Mount Airy, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Choose from one and two bedroom floor plans with ample closet spaces. Sedgwick Gardens Apartments are conveniently located near the H bus stop (right outside the community), the regional rail and the R8 are just one block away, just one minute away from Weaver Way. It is also in close proximity to Fairmount Park's walking and biking trails & just down the street from Lincoln Drive. There's a wealth of options if you're looking for a bite to eat Toto's Pizzeria, Linda's Vegetarian Village, High Pointe Café, Bacio Italian Ristorante, and more
Available for immediate move in, is this fully renovated 1 bedrooms apartment. This gorgeous 1 -2 bedrooms features lovely hardwood floors throughout. The kitchen is fully renovated and boasts beautiful counter tops, and new modern four-piece appliances. Enjoy natural lighting courtesy of the new large energy efficient windows in this apartment. The living room is spacious and the bathroom is elegant. The bedroom is airy with exquisite mirrored closet doors. On site laundry facilities, fitness center, and storage units, 24 hr emergency maintenance, and individually operated air condition and heat. Residents are responsible for electric, gas and water.
The Regional train station (Upsal station) Chestnut Hill West line and close to Carpenter lane train station in center city in 12-15 minutes.
